summary: This mod simply changes the night eye spell so it lasts for 999 minutes and removes the awful eye killing blur effect.  This will work for khajiit and vampire night eye spells.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
            LFox Improved Night Eye No Blur v1.0
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies the night eye spells
or its shader.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

This mod simply changes the night eye spell so it lasts for 999
minutes and removes the awful eye killing blur effect.  This
will work for khajiit and vampire night eye spells.

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.0
- Made the plugin
author: LFox
